channel.title: Programming on Kurcz Valentin
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Kurcz Valentin

item.title: Reverse engineering - No. 1
item.description: Introduction to the world of reverse engineering, where I solve beginner-level program reverse engineering tasks, demonstrate techniques and basics. All I can say is: “Abandon all hope, ye who enter here.”

item.title: Locality-Aware programming
item.description: It is crucial how we traverse a matrix, whether column-wise, row-wise, or randomly. This article explores how to leverage our knowledge about computers for the benefit of our programs.
